name: THE TAKEOVER (itch) (Malia Scott)
description:
Welcome!

This is a first person shooter game as well my first person shooter game ever.

There's a robot invasion taking place at your sci-fi home. Your objective is to eliminate  them by using various weapons to take your home back and win.

Be careful....they attack pretty hard.

NOTE FROM ME, THE DEVELOPER:

To start off.....I first want to say this is my first time uploading a game on this website. I design and build in Unity called THE TAKEOVER. I designed this game over the summer. The game build started out doing a tutorial within Unity and turning it around by using my ideas and various assets in Unity's assets store to build the game. The assets I used for this game called Sci-Fi Styled Modular Pack by Karboosx. I thought these assets would be prefect for my game :) Being in college studying game design, I'm still learning a lot about how games are made and so far I love making games within Unity. I learned lot about working in Unity, still learning though. I have other games I made for college courses, however, I'm going to go back and work, and add things to them. But for this game, I wanted to make a whole new game that I want to take my time with and taking the knowledge I learn from college courses and outside of the courses to see my knowledge and ideas come to life.

So please feel free to leave your ratings, suggestions and improvements that I can make in the comments, after you tried the game!

Thank you again! :)

MADE WITH:

Unity

PLATFORM:

This game is only made for window users.

CONTROLS: 

This game supports Keyboard and Mouse as well a Gamepad.

BE SURE TO LOOK AT THE CONTROLS BEFORE PLAYING!
